The nearest, and most used, airport near Wolfville is
. Wolfville is an hour away from Halifax taking Highway 101 West and can be reached through exit 10 or 11.
. Visitors should also know that most attractions in Wolfville lie on its Main Street which can be accessed most comfortably by walking along its sidewalks.

value: directions= Traveling east on Main Street, turn left at the Library Pub
content= A view of the Bay of Fundy and some of the highest tides in the world.

Tourists can hike along the trails in Wolfville and can explore the many plants and flowers at the
on University Ave. You can also enjoy a peaceful stroll along the dykes in Wolfville.

For a tourist, Wolfville has a whole host of small shops along its Main Street; including gift shops, hiking apparel shops, clothing stores, movie stores, and book stores. For general needs, Wolfville has a Shopper's Drugmart and a Pharmasave along its Main Street.
Like most Canadian towns, Wolfville also has a Subway and a Tim Hortons.
